addr: 10 cities across the country- Boca Raton, Dallas, Philadelphia, Baltimore, North Jersey, Chicago, Atlanta, Boston, Cleveland, Los Angeles
title: Sports Broadcasting Camps 2016
desc: Sports Broadcasting Camps for kids 10-18. Make sports anchor/reporting tape, PTI and play-by-play tapes. Tour pro sports facilities, meet celebrities in the industry, participate in trivia and stump the schwab contests,?and much more.
